title: LG K580 13.2 cm (5.2") Single SIM Android 6.0 4G Micro-USB 2 GB 16 GB 2520 mAh Metallic
description:
LG K580 13.2 cm (5.2") Single SIM Android 6.0 4G Micro-USB 2 GB 16 GB 2520 mAh Metallic


Precision 3D Arc Glass Design Bended glass, bold and beautiful. A slim tapered top and bottom bended glass finish in a double wedge design. With a slimness of 6.9mm, it easily slides into your pocket, jacket, or handbag, but feels solid in your hand. Dual Camera with 120º Wide Angle Wider scope, and vivid detail. Capture photos that spread as wide as what your eyes can see, at an impressive 120° wide angle. The dual rear camera shoots 78° regular angle photos at an astounding 13MP resolution. Get it wide, get it in detail. Pop-out Picture Magical moving moments. Tickle yourself with memorable scenes that go forward, backward, loop, and repeat. Spice up your photos and videos with 6 photographical frames and 4 stunning effects (Fisheye, B&W, Vignette, Lens Blur). Images and movies stand out and pop out above all the rest. Tall and Wide Panorama Side to side, up and down. The heightened fullness of dual camera panorama spans not only 120° wide, but also stretches up and down for a view that reveals a whole new realm. 5.2” Full HD Display Treat your eyes to sharpness and clarity. The expansive 5.2” Full HD display gives your eyes so much more to take in. More resolution, detail, colour, and crystal clarity. While watching movies, sports, or playing games, take it all in. 1.14GHz Octa-Core Processor Sheer Octa-core speed and efficiency. The 1.14GHz Octa-core processor equips you with power to multitask, while preserving more battery life. Your phone can do more, faster, and for longer. 2,520mAh Embedded Battery Enjoy the hassle-free convenience of ample power with the 2,520mAh embedded battery. Android Marshmallow Built to get the best out of the world's most popular platform, the LG X cam is the ultimate Android experience.

title: LG Optimus L9 P760 11.9 cm (4.7") Single SIM Android 4.0.4 3G Micro-USB 1 GB 4 GB 2150 mAh Black
description:
LG Optimus L9 P760 11.9 cm (4.7") Single SIM Android 4.0.4 3G Micro-USB 1 GB 4 GB 2150 mAh Black


The size XL L-Style Optimus L9 has the largest display of the family L-Style. Diagonal of 4.7 "- the widest in its class - qHD resolution (960x540 pixels) and IPS technology, a guarantee of color fidelity and image quality. Processor "Tri-Dual" Optimum performance and extremely fuida Android experience are the hallmarks of Optimus L9 and its Dual Core Processor Dual Channel. Thanks to the kind of Tri-Dual, the flow of information between the two processors and memory is optimized, eliminating the possible "bottlenecks" of the traditional dual-core architecture. LG Quick Translator The Quick Translator is the new application from LG can translate in real time any captured text in the preview of the camera. Just frame a text written in a foreign language and will display the Quick Translator translation on the display, simplifying your life when you're on the go. The Quick Translator can be used with or without internet connection. - With Internet connection you can use more than 40 dictionaries using the Google Translate engine. - Without an Internet connection, you can download a free dictionary to translate single words. You can download dictionaries for a fee. Quick Memo You need to take a note on the fly? Just press the volume keys to activate Quick Memo ™ and Optimus L9 will turn into a notepad. You can draw on any screen you are viewing, select the pen color or use a highlighter. With one click you can share your notes on Facebook or send it via e-mail. High capacity battery Optimus L9 has a 2150mAh battery which ensures high autonomy even in the face of heavy use. Thanks to the higher energy density, the technology of SiO + LG allows to realize batteries with very high capacity and reduced dimensions: in fact, the thickness of Optimus L9 is only 8.9mm! Virtual Keypad With Optimus L9 write E-mail is even more comfortable, thanks to the keyboard on the size adaptable. Swiping your finger on the keyboard to the right or to the left you can "shrink" the keys to type comfortably with one hand. If you hold the smartphone in horizontal and you have trouble getting the central keys, simply spread your fingers to "break" the keyboard into two parts. Photo and Video Quality With the power of Optimus L9 you can record videos in FullHD or apply effects in real time to faces: big mouth, small eyes, and so on (max resolution. VGA). In addition, thanks to the snap to "Cheese" you can take pictures by simply saying "cheese." Finally, there are the flash, autofocus and the ability to take panoramic pictures. Full Connectivity DLNA, NFC, Wi-Fi Direct and 21.1Mbps HSPA: Optimus L9 has it all in terms of connectivity. The Smart Share allows you to share videos, photos and PowerPoint presentations on TV without the use of wires while while NFC technology can be used to transfer contact lists and websites, or for the configuration with a gesture of thanks to NFC Tag (sold separately).

title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra 17.5 cm (6.9") Dual SIM Android 15 5G USB Type-C 12 GB 1 TB 5000 mAh Silver, White
description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra 17.5 cm (6.9") Dual SIM Android 15 5G USB Type-C 12 GB 1 TB 5000 mAh Silver, White


Simple. Impactful Galaxy S25 Ultra's rounded design expresses a unified identity for the Galaxy S series. With its sleek and strong titanium frame and a built-in S Pen, it's an ultra-modern, vision of bold design. Looks sleek, built tough Shielded in a strong titanium frame, reinforced by Corning® Gorilla® Armor 2 display glass and with an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance, take this Galaxy further than you thought possible. Personalised briefings for your day Get personalised briefings throughout the day from the all-new Now Brief. Start your morning with a run-down of the day ahead, such as checking your latest Energy Score and reminders of a busy schedule. Then, recap on the day's events in the evening with daily activity insights. A sound studio at your fingertips Filter out unwanted background noise from your videos and make them share-worthy with Audio Eraser. Galaxy AI fine-tunes your audio by adjusting different types of sound including voices, music, wind and more. The future of health, now made personal Keep up with your health goals by tracking your Energy Score. Sync with Galaxy Watch or Ring and receive personalised insights and coaching such as an analysis of your sleep, activity and heart rate. Personal data stays personal The Personal Data Engine combines and processes your primary data and provides tailored suggestions. It encrypts this data and saves it on your device with Knox Vault, making it inaccessible to anyone else. You can even monitor the security of other Galaxy devices right from your Galaxy smartphone. Unrivaled Nightography video. Less noise, more clarity Now you can shoot in improved 10-bit HDR for a more stunning videography experience. Our advanced AP also delivers more precise noise removal meaning you won't have to worry about grainy night footage again. The sharpest details from Wide to Tele and even Ultra Wide From Ultra Wide shots to our Telephoto camera, photos are clear and vivid at any angle. Our AI enhanced ProVisual Engine then improves colour and details for next-level clarity. The most powerful processor customised for Galaxy Introducing our most powerful processor, customised for Galaxy. With improved real-time ray tracing and Vulkan optimisation, dive deep into the action with ultra-smooth gameplay thanks to Snapdragon® 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy. Clearer, more vivid viewing by ProScaler ProScaler enhances resolution by using advanced AI-algorithm processing to deliver a viewing experience in high definition without having to adjust the display settings. Unparalleled battery life Our pioneering mDNIe technology has been built into our custom-made AP, and with software optimisation, battery usage time is enhanced so you can enjoy hours of watching videos. All new One UI 7, built for AI Get access to your Now Brief alerts, music and more from the Now Bar. The new home screen is all yours with highly-customisable layouts and new widgets. Live notifications let you monitor on-going activities such as voice recordings on the Now Bar, status bar or at the top of your notification panel.

title: Samsung Galaxy Note 3 Neo SM-N7505 14 cm (5.5") Single SIM Android 4.3 4G Micro-USB 2 GB 16 GB 3100 mAh White
description:
Samsung Galaxy Note 3 Neo SM-N7505 14 cm (5.5") Single SIM Android 4.3 4G Micro-USB 2 GB 16 GB 3100 mAh White


Expanding the groundbreaking Galaxy Note experience, Note3 neo tilts the balance towards distinctive design factor and innovative, remarkably easy functionality. Its winning style starts with attractive leather-look design and fun colour option. Sensational S Pen combines striking “air commands” with powerful usability and awesome multitasking. Perfect host device to Galaxy Gear, a smartwatch companion that provides the most integrated Note experience yet. Leather stitch design Galaxy Note3 Neo sports a distinctively sleek, leather-like back cover with top-stitch design that sets it apart -- it’s no ordinary device. Protective and pleasing to the palm, it’s secure to grip or lay on any surface without slippage. Slim, refined form factor contributes to its unique look and feel. Stay with tried and true colours like White or Black, or for the more adventurous, try the Mint colour option to really stand out. Premium Note Experience The new S Pen reinvents and modernizes the classic note-taking experience by providing the ability to accomplish everyday tasks with just one click. The advanced S Pen is designed to be fully functional by creating essential input and control features. It plays an integral role in how users interface with the device, making all daily routines easier. Hover your S Pen anywhere on the screen and by just clicking a button aside S Pen, it gives you a quick access to 5 useful features. The New S Pen can direct a universal menu in Action Memo, Scrapbooker, Screen Write, S Finder and Pen Window via Air Command which can complete a variety of tasks easily by just clicking a button aside. Discover the ultimate performance in your everyday life. Galaxy Gear Compatibility Note3 neo is designed to integrate with innovative Galaxy Gear technology so you get the best of both worlds. Your Note device hosts Galaxy Gear’s apps for interrelated functionality but you can make and receive calls on your smartwatch alone -- leave your Note3 neo untouched! Any SNS, IM or email alerts on Galaxy Gear are synced with host device, opening apps automatically when you pick up your Note3 neo so you can respond without delay. Auto Lock both locks and unlocks your device when Galaxy Gear is at a distance of 1.5 meters to safeguard against unauthorized use of your Note3 neo and its contents.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6
description:
Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6


Galaxy AI is here Put PC-like power in your pocket, Galaxy Z Fold6. More powerful than ever with its super-slim, productive screen. Now super-charged with Galaxy AI on foldables. THE LIGHTEST THE THINNEST UNFOLD PERFECTION Thinner and lighter with a pocket-worthy silhouette, and an even brighter, awe-inspiring fold-out screen. Galaxy AI is here on Galaxy Foldables CIRCLE TO SEARCH Circle to search on the big screen It's an efficient way to search on a smartphone — just make a circle. Boost your productivity on the massive fold-out screen, with your finger or the S Pen. NOTE ASSIST The easiest way to summarise notes on Samsung foldables Get lecture notes in just a few taps — even as you multitask. Note Assist transcribes recordings and organises them into notes, producing efficient summaries.2 For everything else there's S Pen, ready to work wonders on the sweeping screen. Chat Assist Need to write something in a hurry? Just type a few keywords to achieve full productivity. Browsing Assist Found a website that you need to understand quickly? AI summarises entire websites in a flash. PHOTO ASSIST Effortless editing. Courtesy of Galaxy AI The object-aware engine lets you edit photos to your heart's content. With Photo Assist, just hold your finger down on an object to move, erase or enlarge it; adjust angles or fill backgrounds just as easily. Portrait Studio Let AI ignite your imagination with Portrait Studio. Self portraits instantly turn into incredible works of art. A photograph is applied with the Portrait Studio feature for Photo Assist. AI effects are applied to the portrait, with vibrant colours. Instant Slow-mo Instant Slow-mo lets you focus on key moments by selectively applying slow motion to a video, and sharing or saving the clip. Sketch to Image Draw from scratch or on any photo. Use AI to transform that sketch into an image. The Sketch to Image feature is activated on a Galaxy Z Fold6 screen. S Pen draws on the photo, to make the sketch into a new image with AI. INTERPRETER Your ultimate interpreter experience with dual screens Traveling and need to talk with the locals? Interpreter translates on the spot whether you're expressing yourself, listening to a global conference or to a tour guide. LIVE TRANSLATE Borderless phone calls Translate phone conversations instantly. Perfect for real-time voice translation on various apps, especially when you're making calls that involve two languages. Chat with Gemini to supercharge your ideas Thanks to Samsung’s longstanding partnership with Google, your Galaxy now comes with the Google Gemini app. Chat with Gemini to get help learning in new ways, writing thank you notes, planning events and more. GET FULLY IMMERSED Our most immersive smartphone gaming Fold open a mobile gaming beast with a massive screen made better with the Vision Booster's powerful brightness and clarity even in broad daylight. Powerful gaming with the fastest processor on a Samsung foldable Enjoy silky-smooth gaming with Vulkan, even in AAA games. Then, Snapdragon® 8 Gen 3 for Galaxy renders graphics that are absolutely fire. Game harder. Game longer Our battery ensures all-day enjoyment. It's not just a massive battery, but also leverages a more efficient display. Game on. Turn Pro. ProVisual Engine Meet Fold's most powerful camera system yet. Topped with an upgraded NPU, mind-blowing specs and ProVisual Engine, it'll transform your multimedia experience. Extremely detail-oriented With our high-resolution, 50MP camera, witness every detail come to life with stunning clarity and vibrancy. Crystal-clear zoom. Powered by AI Zoom way, way, way in while keeping noise down and resolution clear with ProVisual Engine. Its sharp analysis of the zoomed-in region enhances your shot dramatically. Zoom Map Use the Zoom Map to get your bearings when you're zoomed in; it'll make navigation a breeze. Brighten things up with Super HDR See it, believe it. Super HDR puts the right emphasis on details to pop and impress, even before you take the picture.

title: LG K4 K120E 11.4 cm (4.5") Android 5.1 4G 1 GB 8 GB 1940 mAh White
description:
LG K4 K120E 11.4 cm (4.5") Android 5.1 4G 1 GB 8 GB 1940 mAh White


Find Your Own Style You are the hero of your story and you call all the shots. Stand out against convention and follow your intuition. Explore the world around you and capture selfies of every bold move you make! The LG K4 is an original, just like you. Adventure on! 4.5" Display + Compact Design Meet the wow factor! Impress at every occasion with a sleek, stylish design and a screen where all your colors pop. Gesture Shot Perfect your selfie pose. Just raise your hand, align it in the box, and make a fist to start the 3-second timer. Don’t forget to smile! Flash for Selfie The night is your time to shine! With 2MP front camera, take brilliant selfies with a screen that lights up around the photo preview. 5MP Rear Camera Make memories that go viral. Shoot share-worthy pictures with an easy-to-use 5MP rear camera.

title: TCL 40 403 15.2 cm (6") Dual SIM Android 12 Go edition 4G Micro-USB B 2 GB 32 GB 3000 mAh Black
description:
TCL 40 403 15.2 cm (6") Dual SIM Android 12 Go edition 4G Micro-USB B 2 GB 32 GB 3000 mAh Black


Enjoy what you see. Stylishly enlarged 6" screen with in-hand comfort. Expansive. Captivating. Ultra-wide 18:9 aspect ratio offers movie-like viewing. 2 eye-care modes provide ultimate comfort for your e-reading and streaming time. Dedicated eye comfort. Less harmful blue light while web browsing and streaming. For e-reading sessions. A paper-like screen with soothing grayscale effect. Storage for all that matters. Enjoy getting things done with all essential apps, stored together with your daily snaps and videos. 2GB RAM for snappy multitasking. Run multiple apps and keep several tabs open while web browsing or streaming smoothly. 256/512 GB microSD 32GB memory can be conveniently extended. All-day power for your daily life. Smart power-saving modes optimize the 3000mAh battery, preserving the power you need for web browsing, streaming, and completing daily tasks. Super power saving. Increase battery life by up to 20% while your phone is not in use. 2-in-1 hyper camera Enhanced macro shots. Easily record close-ups and wider scenes with a 2-in-1 hyper camera. Its main 8MP lens smartly works as a macro one. More light. Brighter pics. HDR mode reveals more colors for low-light shots. More pixels. Bigger pics. A 2MP front camera shoots with the clarity effect of 5MP resolution.

title: Samsung Galaxy S6 edge+ SM-G928 14.5 cm (5.7") Single SIM Android 5.1 4G Micro-USB 4 GB 64 GB 3000 mAh Black
description:
Samsung Galaxy S6 edge+ SM-G928 14.5 cm (5.7") Single SIM Android 5.1 4G Micro-USB 4 GB 64 GB 3000 mAh Black


Big screen. Big entertainment. Immerse yourself in the content you love with the sleek design and brilliant dual edge screen on the Galaxy S6 edge+. With a 5.7" Quad HD Super AMOLED 2560x1440 resolution display, you can watch videos and images come to life on your screen. The edge of innovation Keep your top five contacts and apps at your fingertips for quick access. Always see who’s contacting you with a discreet light-up notification on the edge screen. Share live video in real time Share life’s can’t-miss moments with your friends as they happen. Take live video and broadcast it via YouTube™ with this built-in app. Pay Almost Anywhere You Can Swipe or Tap Your Card‡ Introducing Samsung Pay, the mobile payment service that works virtually anywhere you can swipe your card — from local grocery stores to corner coffee shops to your favorite department store. It’s also highly secure and simple to use with your Galaxy S6 edge+. Only compatible with select cards from participating banks/issuers, participating carriers and certain Samsung devices; check the Samsung Pay page for a compatibility list. Breakthrough battery technology The Samsung Galaxy S6 edge+ built-in technology gives you the freedom to recharge wirelessly. Fast Charging lets you power your 3,000mAh battery quickly. Or you can tap Ultra Power Saving Mode at 10% charge and get up to 24 hours of talk and text time. Powerful performance Powered by the Samsung Exynos 7420 Octa-core 64-bit processor and combined with 4GB of RAM, the new Galaxy S6 edge+ gives you our best speed and performance. Load times are faster, so you can browse, work, watch and game in an instant. The easy way to transfer content to a new device Switching to the new Galaxy S6 edge+ has never been simpler — or smarter. With Samsung Smart Switch, you have the freedom to move your contacts, text messages, music and other media from your previous device to your new Samsung Galaxy. The way music should be heard Your favorite tunes have never sounded better on a Samsung smartphone. This breakthrough audio technology can take select music files and enhance the richness and detail. More reasons to love your Galaxy S6 edge+ Get the most out of your Galaxy S6 edge+ with the Samsung+ app. Along with one-touch access to customer support, you’ll discover device tips, a library of resources and more. Plus, you’ll have access to complimentary music and exclusive clips. Samsung+ makes life with the Galaxy S6 edge+ even better.
